channel.title: Mid/side patching
channel.description:
Hello! I was curious on Mid/side manipulation to be able to get more possibilities out of a simple stereo channel output. My idea was to hard pan some sounds and other sounds are just centered, and by Mid/side techniques attempting to get three channels out of the two!
Has anyone attempted this and can share experiences? I'll have at it tonight and see how far I go. =)

item.title: Mid/side patching
item.dc:creator: @workerparasite303
item.description:
@workerparasite303 wrote:

i use M/S almost exclusively for mastering, haven't thought about doing it in the patcher. if you dont mind, share some results?

Read full topic
